name: magium/configuration-manager
description: Provides a generic plugable configuration management interface similar to Magento

suggest.laminas/laminas-psr7bridge: For use with the optional view layer
suggest.laminas/laminas-view: For use with the optional view layer
suggest.laminas/laminas-http: For use with the optional view layer
suggest.laminas/laminas-form: For use with the optional view layer
suggest.laminas/laminas-i18n: For use with the optional view layer
suggest.laminas/laminas-json: For use with the optional view layer
suggest.mongodb/mongodb: If you intend to use MongoDB for your configuration storage
suggest.laminas/laminas-db: If you intend to use a relational DB for your configuration storage
suggest.symfony/yaml: If you intend to use yaml for parsing configuration files
